basic.description:
{Basic Eagle Eye}

40% chance to learn any spell up to 2nd level used in combat. Enemy's spells cost 1 more.

advanced.description:
{Advanced Eagle Eye}

50% chance to learn any spell up to 3rd level used in combat. Enemy's spells cost 2 more.

expert.description:
{Expert Eagle Eye}

60% chance to learn any spell up to 4th level used in combat. Enemy's spells cost 3 more.
